author: madhvi
text: Penalty should  be charged  on markaz

author: madhvi
text: If all the employees will be healthy they can resume to work after 21 days and manage all losess but if we lose all the employees and their families then what will happen to the plant too?(bhilai chhattisgarh)

author: madhvi
text:
Is there anyone who could give a guarantee that people who would be infected by plant will recover and live? 
If not we are knowingly sending these innocent people to a dangerous place which can impact thousands of families(bhilai  chhattisgarh)

author: madhvi
text:
BSP employees get 21 days leave 
How can we risk the life of employees and their families like this? 
They are not health care professionals..
Keeping them safe is more important than production of steel 
(Bhilai, chhattisgarh)

author: madhvi
text:
By this time other cases also have been registered in Bhilai Raipur so there is not enough facility to take care of all the employees and families.. 
So they choose whom to keep on ventilator and ICU and whom to send (bhilai  chhattisgarh)

author: madhvi
text:
There could be two scenarios 1)Coronavirus is in stage 2 
BSP employees get 21 days 
Only after 14 days symptoms start to appear and by then half of the staff and families have been infected!(bhilai chhattisgarh)
